name: AddPersonsToStaticCohort
description:
Add persons to a static cohort in Datadog.

This tool updates a static cohort by adding new persons to it in a specified project within Datadog.

parameters.name: cohort_id
parameters.description: A unique integer that identifies the cohort to update.

value_schema.description: A unique integer value identifying this cohort.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Retrieve it via /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: person_uuids_to_add
parameters.description: List of person UUIDs to add to the cohort.

value_schema.description: List of person UUIDs to add to the cohort

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
